attributes.action: giving away freebies to unwanted migrants with no intention of working
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is to give the BRITISH public an opportunity to look at this and sign if they agree that giving FREE houses and vast amounts of money to migrants has got to stop.  These people should be made to earn their keep.  It is OUR money and we are going through a credit crunch and the Government must act now.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
